1.content: Alright, who should be the lucky girl that will grow?
1.title: Time to begin.

15.content: Alright, who else will be the lucky gainer?
15.title: Other choices

info.brief_description: The girls from Elfen Lied are gonna start packing on a lot of weight.
info.description:
The girls from Elfen Lied are gonna grow into much more larger and fatter sizes.

While this anime is known for its violence and gore, there will be some rules to keep this from being too grim.

1. Sex and violence is allowed, just do not kill off the main characters and keep the sex to a average level.

2. Nudity is not allowed, please keep it to the limit of having characters with at least having bras and panties on them.

3. There is no weight limit on how big you want the girls to be, make them into mountains or planets however you want.

4. Female weight gain is only allowed, if you want male weight gain, go make your own interactive of it.

5. The girls can gain weight in anyway you choose so as long as it involves them gaining weight only.

6. Please try to write chapters that are not short, I'm not asking for super long chapters, but I at least want to see some effort put into them. I will delete any that are not at least 20 words long, or are not revelant to the story.

Other than that have fun and be creative.
